channel.title: Hello everyone!
channel.description: Hi everyone! I'm Neta, a 21 y.o. student who works for a grill equipment shop. I'm completely new to bootstrap and web in general(just started to study), and I was asked to write a website like this ([https://bestgrillcover.com/](https://bestgrillcover.com/)) using bootstrap. I'm asking for any tips for this task. Thx in advance, and glad to join the community.

item.title: Hello everyone!
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Neta.

This forum is about bootstrapping, as in running a self-funded business, not about bootstrap the CSS framework. But welcome to the forum!

Read full topic

item.title: Hello everyone!
item.dc:creator: NetaFinkel
item.description:
Hi everyone!
I’m Neta, a 21 y.o. student who works for a grill equipment shop. I’m completely new to bootstrap and web in general(just started to study), and I was asked to write a website like this (https://bestgrillcover.com/) using bootstrap.
I’m asking for any tips for this task.
Thx in advance, and glad to join the community.

Read full topic
